alert.note: Alert for Rutherford (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 11:44AM CDT until August 07 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN RUTHERFORD...NORTHERN COFFEE...WARREN...NORTHEASTERN BEDFORD...NORTHERN GRUNDY AND SOUTHERN CANNON COUNTIES... At 1144 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Manchester, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... McMinnville, Manchester, Altamont, Morrison, Wartrace, Bell Buckle, Beersheba Springs, Centertown, Viola, Bradyville, Beechgrove and Summitville. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 91 and 111. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
